articles.title: "No Uterus, No Opinion": Massive Protests In US As Abortion Right Ends - NDTV
articles.description: Abortion rights defenders fanned out across America Saturday for a second day of protest against the Supreme Court's thunderbolt ruling, as state after conservative state moved swiftly to ban the procedure.
articles.content:
US Abortion Rights Protests: At least eight right-leaning states imposed immediate bans on abortion.

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: How the US states have responded to Roe reversal - 9News
articles.description: Americans were taking stock a day after the Supreme Court overturned a woman's constitutional right to an abortion, as states began implementing bans and supporters and foes of abortion rights mapped out their next moves.
